casebody.data:
AVOKI
v.
FEREBEE, et al. No. 284P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Dec. 15, 2015. Francisco K. Avoki, Chester, for Avoki, Francisco K., et al. Ekoko K. Avoki. C. Rob Wilson, Charlotte, for Ferebee, Larry Eugene (Jr.), et al. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th of August 2015 by Plaintiffs to Proceed In Forma Pauperis: "Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 15th of December 2015." Ervin, J. recused.
